arts.ttl: Ipswich sign ex-Everton star Ben Godfrey on loan from Atalanta for the rest of the season - bolstering Kieran McKenna's defence ahead of their fight for Premier League survival
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Ipswich Town have confirmed the loan signing of Atalanta defender Ben Godfrey. The former Everton defender will link up with Kieran McKenna 's men for the rest of the season.

arts.ttl: ‘Not at Premier League level’: Fulham’s Silva blasts referee after Ipswich draw
arts.sum: Manager hits out at official after 2-2 draw ‘Really difficult to explain some decisions’ A frustrated Marco Silva, the Fulham manager, described the performance of Darren Bond, the referee, as “not at Premier League level” after he opted not to dismiss the Ipswich defender Leif Davis during the sides’ 2-2 draw. Fulham had to settle for a fifth draw in six games against dogged opponents who had led twice through Sammie Szmodics and a Liam Delap spot-kick. But Silva and his players felt Davis should have been sent off in the 28th minute after illegally halting Harry Wilson’s run towards goal, Bond issuing a yellow card and presumably feeling Ipswich’s Dara O’Shea was well placed to cover. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fulham unbeaten in EIGHT after late comeback draw with Ipswich
arts.sum: Three penalties were scored as Fulham and Ipswich Town played out a dramatic 2-2 draw at Craven Cottage, with Raul Jimenez netting twice from the spot to earn the hosts a point and extend the Cottagers' unbeaten run to eight matches. That put Ipswich on course for their first set of back-to-back Premier League wins this season, but Leif Davis ' tired challenge on Jimenez allowed the Mexican to net his second penalty in the first minute of stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Ipswich sign defender Godfrey on loan from Atalanta
arts.sum: Former Everton defender Ben Godfrey has joined Ipswich Town from Serie A side Atalanta on loan until the end of the 2024/25 season. Ipswich announced the signing of Godfrey - their first of the January transfer window - minutes after Sunday's 2-2 draw at Fulham that keeps Kieran McKenna's side in the bottom three.

arts.ttl: Silva 'cannot understand' referee after Davis avoids red at Fulham
arts.sum: Marco Silva slammed referee Darren Bond and said he "cannot understand" how Leif Davis avoided a red card for a last-player foul in Ipswich's draw at Fulham.

arts.ttl: Fulham boss Marco Silva baffled by decision not to send off Ipswich’s Leif Davis
arts.sum: Raul Jimenez scored two penalties as the Cottagers twice came from behind to clinch a point against the Tractor Boys.

arts.ttl: Raul Jimenez scores two penalties as Fulham battle for draw at home to Ipswich
arts.sum: The visitors twice took the lead at Craven Cottage through Sammie Szmodics and Liam Delap.

arts.ttl: Fulham 2-2 Ipswich: Player ratings as Jimenez penalty double rescues point
arts.sum: Player ratings from Fulham's clash with Ipswich in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Official: Atalanta send Godfrey to Ipswich Town on loan
arts.sum: As expected, Atalanta have officially sent Ben Godfrey on loan to Ipswich Town as he...

arts.ttl: Fulham 2-2 Ipswich: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Raul Jimenez rescues a point for Marco Silva's side
arts.sum: Raul Jimenez scores a stoppage-time leveller as Fulham draw 2-2 with Ipswich Town in Sunday afternoon's Premier League clash at Craven Cottage.
